Posts.Content: May 30, 2016 03:21AM Tamian wrote: I am just diagnosed same as you were. Will have surgery on 2 days. What did you decide to do? I gave to lose 35 lbs if I want to have double mastectomy with immediate diep flap reconstruction. I have been encouraged to do this. If I have radiation I am no longer a candidate for reconstruction. I think I just found a second lump. Would be interested in knowing what you did and how it went.
Posts.Title: Lumpectomy or Mastecomy AZ100615 kdtheatre
